items.title: White House releases plan to broaden access to IVF, fertility drugs
items.description: President Donald Trump announced guidance encouraging employers to offer fertility benefits and a plan to cut the cost of fertility drugs.

items.title: Appeals court won’t let Trump deploy National Guard in Illinois for now
items.description: A federal judge had said Trump could not deploy troops in Illinois.

items.title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker reports $1.4 million in Las Vegas gambling winnings
items.description: “I like to play cards,” said Pritzker, a billionaire who is often touted as a potential 2028 Democratic presidential candidate, a prospect he has not ...

items.title: Trump, buoyed by Gaza deal, plans Putin summit on Ukraine peace
items.description: Trump is seeking another diplomatic breakthrough days after brokering a ceasefire deal between Israel and Hamas.

items.title: Senate blocks military spending bill as shutdown drags on
items.description: Lawmakers aren’t much closer to ending the deadlock that has shuttered the federal government.
